TextView.android:text:
Location providers:
 GPS provider is by default used if there is no internet connection
 Network provider is used by default if there is a connection
 GPS provider can have difficulties getting location if user is located inside a concrete building

Quick check in:
 Immediately creates an entry at user current location
 Start Service:
 Starts a service that runs in the background and automatically stores location every few seconds.Precise number of seconds is set in the settings.
 Choose file:
 Select a text file from the phone to insert backed up logs in your app. Selecting a non valid format might result in the app crashing.
 Backup and share:
 After selecting what logs you would like to backup , app will generate a text file. Said text file can be shared with some other service installed on your phone. Said file can be inserted in the app via choose file button.
 Open view:
 Lists all entries in a log with the option to view them on the map. Map comes with a play button that loads entries one at the time replaying movements of the user. Load speed is set in the settings.
 Settings:
 Manually adjust service time in seconds, type of provider and map playback speed
